turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Amy, can you order a chocolate and caramel swirl javiva

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: where would you like to pick up your order

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: well, send the order to the location on bailey street, denver

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: is that the one at 25 bailey street location

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: you got it

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: what size drink would you like

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: let's go for a large

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: what dairy product would you like

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: non-dairy product and let's go with almond milk

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: ok. anything else

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: ask for extra chocolate and caramel topping

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: we'll do

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: how soon will the order be ready for pick

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: as soon as I complete the order it should be ready for pick up at the location you requested

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: great. thanks

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: confirming your order of a large chocolate and caramel swirl javiva with almond milk with extra chocolate and caramel to be picked up at 25 bailey street, denver

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: that's correct

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: good. I will send a receipt of the order via text to your mobile

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: thank you

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: anytime. enjoy

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: bye
